Lich

The Lich is an advanced Necromancer subclass that can be unlocked through special means. This is the strongest form a Necromancer can achieve, gaining powerful undead abilities.

Unlocking

The Lich subclass can be unlocked by obtaining the Black Skull of Mastery and using it on a level 10+ Necromancer. The Black Skull of Mastery can be obtained by defeating the Lich boss in the Necropolis.

Abilities

  • Advanced necromancy powers
  • Enhanced control over undead minions
  • Resistance to certain magical effects
  • Access to unique spells and items

Related

  • Lich (Mob)
  • Black Skull of Mastery
  • Necromancer Armor
